name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy spaghetti with pancetta, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Grilled beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Delicious pepperoni pizza with a crispy crust and melted cheese.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Mixed seasonal vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce served with grilled chicken over fettuccine pasta.

name: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
description: Fresh tuna salad served with lettuce and tomato on whole-grain bread.
